articles.title: KCNA Commentary Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Gibberish about Security
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Gibberish about Security
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Chief Executive Park Geun Hye and Chief of the Security Office of Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin are becoming evermore undisguised in their provocation against the DPRK.
					 At a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae Park instructed Kim to "make sure that there is no security vacuum", trumpeting about the "threat and provocation from the north". Echoing her words, Kim jabbered that he would "tighten the national security" and "devote himself to laying a foundation for peaceful unification" and the like.
					
					 This is nothing but ugly looking kiss between the anti-reunification conservative elders.
					
					 This is, at the same time, no more than sophism let loose by the arch criminals escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and psychopaths seized with "security" phobia.
					
					 Trumpeting about "security" is a trite-method employed by the puppet conservative group of south Korea to strain the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The first order made by Kim right after taking his office as puppet minister of Defense was to infuse the outlook on security into the minds of the service members.
					
					 Park also uttered the word "security" whenever an opportunity presented itself.
					
					 She cried out for "maintaining perfect security posture to cope with the north's provocation against the south as the former intensifies its propaganda offensive" on January 18 during her foreign trip.
					
					 In May, too, she held an emergency meeting as regards what she called the north's shelling at which she called for "tightening the security posture."
					
					  Under that pretext the U.S. and south Korean forces staged war drills for aggression and stepped up the arms buildup, escalating the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 Entering this year, they staged in south Korea the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, the largest-ever in the world, with huge U.S. nuclear war hardware and aggressor forces involved.
					
					 It pushed the situation to the brink of a war by staging large-scale joint landing drills aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" and Max Thunder, the joint air combat drills targeting the whole of the DPRK, to push the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 This being a hard reality, for whom is the "security" touted by the puppet regime necessary?
					
					 Its "security" motto precisely means confrontation and a prelude to the war against the north.
					
					 At an annual "security" consultative meeting the U.S. and the puppet group worked out and officially decided on the scenarios for preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK including the "tailored deterrent strategy." 
					
					 The puppet group has cooked up anti-reunification documents and scenarios for the confrontation of the social systems under the signboard of "security" as evidenced by the fact that it called for "leading the north to changes" through "balanced promotion of security and exchange and cooperation" in its "second principal plan for the development of north-south relations."
					
					 It is again under the pretext of the "threat to security" that the puppet group has pushed ahead with its move to extend the transfer of wartime operation control to help the U.S. occupy south Korea for an indefinite period and the construction of U.S. military bases including the Jeju naval base is pressed forward in real earnest. This is the reality of south Korea.
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to clearly prove that it is none other than the U.S. and the puppet group that bring the danger of a nuclear war and disturb peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is nonsensical and ridiculous that the puppet group is talking a lot about "security", citing "provocation from the north" and "its threat" though it turned south Korea into the largest nuclear outpost in the Far East.
					
					 Park and Kim's oft-repeated "security" and "unification" are, in the final analysis, little short of an open declaration that they would stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last and would not rule out even a war against it. 
					
					 Security can never be achieved through confrontation and it will bring nothing but a war.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Confab against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Confab against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- It was reported that warmongers of the U.S. and south Korea recently examined Kill Chain and "south Korea-made ballistic missile interceptor system" under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threats from the north" at their "first high-level meeting" for the extension of transfer of wartime operation control (OPECON).
					 Kill Chain is a weapon system for mounting a preemptive attack on a rival when the "sign of its attack" is detected while "south Korea-made ballistic missile interceptor system" is designed to "identify, detect and strike" the nuclear and missiles from the north at an early stage.
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said action taken by them indicates that their moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK have gone beyond the red line.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It was quite natural for the DPRK to have manufactured latest military hardware for self-defence and steadily bolstered it up with much effort under the situation where the U.S. forces present in south Korea have threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons and the south Korean puppet forces have pushed the situation to the brink of war, pursuant to their policy.
					
					 They are making much fuss over the "nuclear and missile threats from the north," shelving their crimes. This reminds one of a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 Should they dare start a war against the DPRK, its army and people will show them what a real war is like by mobilizing all the military capabilities for self-defence built for the past several decades under the banner of Songun. This is their unshakable will.
					
					 The enemies are doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits if they persist in their moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK, warns the commentary.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Malaysia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Malaysia Appointed
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Kang Chol was appointed DPRK ambassador to Malaysia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Prolonged Drought in DPRK
articles.content:
Prolonged Drought in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A spell of dry weather continues in the DPRK. There have been sporadic rainfalls in most areas of the county from 00:00 Tuesday to 10:00 Saturday, which were not enough to overcome the damage from drought.
					 According to data available, it rained 18 mm in Jagang Province, 13 mm in Pyongyang City, 4 to 8 mm in North and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City.
					
					 No rainfall was witnessed in North and South Hwanghae, Ryanggang and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 The drought damage is getting more serious in most parts of North and South Hwanghae provinces and some parts of Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Appointment of Diehard Pro-Japanese Element to Important Post Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Appointment of Diehard Pro-Japanese Element to Important Post Demanded by S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial on June 19 demanding the withdrawal of the appointment of a diehard pro-Japanese element to an important post.
					 Park Geun Hye appointed Pak Hyo Jong, who took the lead in praising pro-Japanese dictatorship, chairperson of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee of south Korea, the editorial noted, adding: 
					
					 Pak Hyo Jong is a core member of neo-conservative circles who beautified the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea as the "period where modern civilization was studied and realized", preached the "theory of modernizing the colony" and steered the publication of pro-Japanese historic textbooks.
					
					 The appointment of Pak Hyo Jong is a blatant challenge against impartiality of the broadcasting services and history.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Outlaws Teachers' Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Outlaws Teachers' Union 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul administrative court made a decision to deprive the Teachers' Union of its legal status on June 19.
					 The court made such ruling, claiming that the union cannot be recognized as a trade union as it accepts the fired teachers as unionists.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Ministry of Education is resorting to the harsh suppression of the union. It instructed the full-time officials of the union to return to their former jobs and informed it of the suspension of negotiations.
					
					 The union held a press conference in protest against such action taken by the puppet regime.
					
					 At the news conference it said that the judicial authorities made the above-said unreasonable decision, confessing themselves that they have been reduced to servants of power.
					
					 It threatened to take legal actions in protest against the unilateral decision made by the court.

articles.title: Polish Body Supports Korean People's Efforts for National Reunification
articles.content:
Polish Body Supports Korean People's Efforts for National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on June 15 to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration is an event which provided the landmark for Korea's reunification and a historic deed which made a breach in the barrier of division by the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 The joint declaration is the shining fruition of leader Kim Jong Il's ardent patriotism and will for reunification. 
					
					 Enthusiasm for reunification and the new era for the development of inter-Korean relations in the wake of the publication of the joint declaration faced a grave challenge by traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon Lee. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye also openly disclosed her ambition for "unification by absorption", keen on the moves for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 This is intolerable as it is the treacherous act of going against the joint declaration. 
					
					 We extend full support to the Korean people in their just struggle to reunify the country independently and peacefully under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings and book and photo exhibitions took place in Tajikistan, Palestine, Uganda and Switzerland in the period from June 10 to 17 to mark the golden anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books telling about the personality of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said that the WPK has developed into the veteran and tested party since Kim Jong Il started work at the C.C., WPK. 
					
					 The acting general secretary of the C.C., the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine said the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il who firmly defended socialist Korea by bravely shattering the moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces will be everlasting in the hearts of the progressive people. 
					
					 The acting secretary general of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said that the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the party building serve as a valuable textbook indicating the way ahead of the progressive political parties of African countries. 
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said that it was the landmark for a new turn in the Korean revolution that Kim Jong Il started work at the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 14 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 W. A. Duminduwardane, chairman of the Committee for Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee and its Secretary-general Upali Bandara secretary general.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 16.
					 At the instruction of King Norodom Sihamoni, Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits through media and hold political and cultural events in the period between June 16 and July 15.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Poland, a photo exhibition in Nigeria and a film show in Indonesia in the period from June 3 to 16 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the party building. Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party said Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the ever-victorious party, meeting the challenges of all the hostile forces by dint of the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses. His exploits serve as a good example and precious textbook for the progressive political parties, the chairman added. 
					
					 The director for Emigration of the Edo State government of Nigeria and other speakers referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il believed in the strength of the popular masses and, relying on it, solved all the problems arising in the revolution and construction and led the DPRK to victory and glory by dint of ideology. 
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company praised Kim Jong Il as an elder statesman who performed distinguished feats in the party building by leading the WPK for nearly half a century. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a meeting for introducing the exploits of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and the reality of the DPRK prospering under the banner of Songun was held in Brazil on May 22 under the co-sponsorship of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Brazilian People's Organization.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Call for Reunification of Korea by Its Concerted Efforts
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Call for Reunification of Korea by Its Concerted Efforts
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers edited special articles to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 The Iranian paper Iran News on June 7 carried an article titled "By Our Nation Itself" illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The north and the south of Korea that were in the state of hostility and confrontation for over half a century could demonstrate the great unity of the nation. This was the fruition of the idea of By Our Nation Itself clarified in the joint declaration. 
					
					 Preserving and implementing the idea of By Our Nation Itself guarantees reunification and prosperity of the Korean nation and peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world. 
					
					 The Indonesian paper International Media on June 3 said:
					
					 Korea's reunification should be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans responsible for it in line with the will and wishes of the Korean nation. 
					
					 Outside forces have neither reason nor justification to interfere in the matter. 
					
					 That is why Korea should be reunified in the idea of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 The Namibian paper New Era on June 2 in an article titled "Providing great programme for reunification" introduced in detail the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by devoting their all to the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people in the drive for building a reunified thriving nation with the steadfast will to achieve the cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Urges U.S. to Face up to Reality of DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Urges U.S. to Face up to Reality of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website articles on June 4 and 8 with the approach of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 An article titled "Truth behind outbreak of Korean war" said that the U.S. imperialists occupied south Korea under the mask of "liberator" in September of 1945 and ignited the Korean war with the sinister purpose for putting the whole Korean peninsula under their control. 
					
					 Another article titled "Lesson drawn from Korean war: U.S. strength is not almighty" said that the Korean war marked a historic event in which the myth of the U.S. strength was shattered to smithereens. 
					
					 Referring to the losses suffered by the U.S. in forces and weaponry during the war, the article went on:
					
					 The U.S. has persistently worked to start a new war against the DPRK for the past several decades, far from drawing a lesson from its defeat in the Korean war. 
					
					 The U.S. is still obsessed with strength-almighty conception. 
					
					 But, the DPRK is quite different from Afghanistan, Iraq and Libya. 
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its might as a powerful nuclear weapons state capable of mercilessly punishing anyone who provokes it wherever he may be on our planet. 
					
					 The U.S. should face up to this stark reality. 
					
					 The U.S. strength is by no means almighty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the Paektusan Czech－Korean Friendship Association on its website "Mt. Paektu" on June 12.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates tasks and ways for developing the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: ACNC comenta disparates de los que vulneran la seguridad en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta disparates de los que vulneran la seguridad en Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- La mandataria titere surcoreana, Park Geun-hye, y el jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae, Kim Kwan Jin, recrudecen sus actos provocadores a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Haciendo referencia a la supuesta "amenaza y provocacion del Norte" en la reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae, Park ordeno a Kim que "no permita ningun vacio en la seguridad".
					
					 Y Kim respondio a ella que "haria solida la seguridad nacional" y "trabajaria con abnegacion para sentar la base de reunificacion pacifica".
					
					  Es otra chismografia de los psicopatas que "se preocupan" de la "seguridad" agravando intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Cuando era ministro de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin abogo primero por inculcar en el ejercito la "concepcion de seguridad".
					
					  Park Geun-hye tambien se referia a la "seguridad" cada vez que se le presentaba la oportunidad.
					
					  El 18 de enero, dijo hasta en el extranjero que cuando el Norte intensifica la ofensiva de propaganda, hay que hacer perfecta la seguridad frente a la provocacion contra el Sur".
					
					  Ademas en mayo convoco la reunion emergente sobre el supuesto "rumor de canonazos del Norte".
					
					  Bajo tal pretexto, se realizaron los ejercicios de guerra agresiva, que agravaron la tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, y se aumentaron los gastos militares.
					
					  Este ano, los titeres surcoreanos libraron los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", de maxima dimension del mundo, introduciendo muchos equipos de guerra nuclear y fuerzas armadas agresoras de Estados Unidos.
					
					  Ademas llevaron al borde de guerra la situacion al desarrollar al doble y triple el entrenamiento de desembarco combinado con el objetivo de la "ocupacion de Pyongyang" y los ejercicios aereos combinados "Max Thunder" para el golpe aereo sobre todas las zonas de la RPDC.
					
					  Entonces, la "seguridad" aludida por la banda surcoreana significa la confrontacion N-S y el preludio de la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					  Practicamente, en las reuniones consultivas de "seguridad", que sostienen anualmente EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, se fabrican y se aprueban oficialmente los planes de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC como la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste".
					
					  Bajo el cartel de "seguridad", se inventan los documentos anti-reunificacion y guiones de confrontacion de regimenes, tales como estipular el parrafo de "inducir al Norte al cambio a traves del fomento equilibrado de la seguridad y la cooperacion e intercambio" en el "segundo plan principal del desarrollo de las relaciones Sur-Norte".
					
					  Ademas, so pretexto de la "amenaza sobre la seguridad", se dilata el traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, que persigue la ocupacion perpetua del Sur de Corea por EE.UU., y se impulsa en etapa crucial la construccion de bases militares norteamericanas como el enclave naval de Jeju.
					
					  La situacion actual demuestra evidentemente que EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana son autores que traen el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, destruyen la paz y vulneran la seguridad.
					
					  Lo susodicho por Park Geun-hye y Kim Kwan Jin en cuanto a la "seguridad" y la "reunificacion" significa la declaracion de enfrentamiento y guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					  La seguridad no se consigue con el enfrentamiento que causara unicamente la guerra.

articles.title: No se relaja la sequia en Corea
articles.content:
No se relaja la sequia en Corea
 Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Entre la hora cero del dia 17 y las 10 del dia 21, cayeron lluvias en la mayoria de localidades del pais.
					 Pero, la sequia sigue atacando muchas zonas.
					
					 Segun estadisticas recogidas, en la provincia de Jagang se reportaron 18mm de precipitaciones; en la ciudad de Pyongyang, 13mm; en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y Phyong-an del Norte, la ciudad de Nampho y la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, 4-8mm.
					
					 Por otra parte, en la mayoria de localidades de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y Hwanghae del Norte, Ryanggang y Kangwon no cayo ni una gota y en algunas zonas de las mismas, el pluviometro marco 2mm apenas.
					
					 Por esta razon, se agravan los efectos de sequia en la mayor parte de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y Hwanghae del Norte y algunas zonas de la provincia de Kangwon.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica conspiracion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea para guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica conspiracion de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea para guerra nuclear anti-RPDC
						
 Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- En la "primera reunion de alto nivel" para dilatar nuevamente el traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos revisaron el "Kill Chain" y el "sistema de interceptacion de misiles balisticos del tipo surcoreano" pretextando la "amenaza de armas nucleares y de misiles del Norte (de Corea)".
					 Kill Chain es el sistema de armamentos que asesta el ataque preventivo si se detecta algun "indicio de ataque" de la contraparte. El segundo sistema tiene la mision de "identificar, detectar y atacar en la etapa inicial" los armamentos nucleares y misiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 En un comentario individual divulgado hoy, el periodico Minju Joson asevera que la revision de esos sistemas significa que pasaron el limite peligroso los movimientos de belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos para desatar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, y prosigue:
					
					 Es muy justo que la RPDC haya fabricado con muchos trabajos los armamentos sofisticados y los desarrollara sin parar como parte de su medida autodefensiva frente a que EE.UU., ocupador del suelo surcoreano, amenaza con armas nucleares a la RPDC y a los titeres surcoreanos que llevan la situacion al borde de guerra confabulandose con el imperio.
					
					 Partiendo de la logica de bandido, ellos pregonan la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte" haciendo vista gorda de sus actos criminales.
					
					 Los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC tiene la firme decision de hacer probar a los enemigos lo que es la guerra de verdad movilizando todo el poderio militar autodefensivo preparado durante varios decenios bajo la bandera del Songun si ellos se atreven a desatar la guerra de agresion.
					
					 Los enemigos seran cadaveres abandonados si siguen portandose como ahora.

articles.title: Entidad polaca apoya lucha de pueblo coreano por reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Entidad polaca apoya lucha de pueblo coreano por reunificacion de patria
 Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- La sucursal polaca de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion con motivo del 14o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					 La nota senala que la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta es un evento historico que preparo el jalon de reunificacion de Corea y abrio agujero en la barrera de division nacional impuesta por el imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					 Afirma que ese documento es un resultado del calido patriotismo y voluntad de reunificacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Prosigue que el fervor de reunificacion y la nueva era de desarrollo de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, producidos por la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, tropezaron con graves desafios por culpa del traidor y vendepatria surcoreano Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 La nacion coreana no lo perdonara jamas, enfatiza y anade que la actual mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye tambien demuestra abiertamente su ambicion de lograr la "reunificacion mediante la absorcion" intensificando la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					 Eso es acto intolerable y vendepatria que contraviene a la Declaracion Conjunta, califica. 
					
					 Por ultimo, expresa el apoyo total a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano por reunificar el pais de manera independiente y pacifica levantando en alto la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
